    [ÎÇ¥Î∞∞Ï∫†] iOS Ïï± Í∞úÎ∞ú Ïã¨Ìôî Í∞úÏù∏ Í≥ºÏ†ú - Ï±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 4

    • 7. Îã´Í∏∞ Î≤ÑÌäº Î∞è Îì±Î°ù Î≤ÑÌäº Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞

    ÏßÄÎÇúÏù¥ÏïºÍ∏∞

    • ‚≠êÔ∏èÏ±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 1 Î≥¥Îü¨Í∞ÄÍ∏∞‚≠êÔ∏è
    • ‚≠êÔ∏èÏ±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 2 Î≥¥Îü¨Í∞ÄÍ∏∞‚≠êÔ∏è
    • ‚≠êÔ∏èÏ±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 3 Î≥¥Îü¨Í∞ÄÍ∏∞‚≠êÔ∏è
    • ÏßÄÎÇúÎ≤àÏóê Ïù¥Ïñ¥ Ï±Ö Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï£ºÎäî BookDetailViewControllerÏóê Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï£ºÎèÑÎ°ù ÌïòÍ≤†ÏäµÎãàÎã§.

    1. Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î°§Î∑∞ÏôÄ Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∏ Î∑∞ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞

    • Ï±Ö ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Îã¥ÏùÑ BookDetailViewControllerÎ•º ÏàòÏ†ïÌï©ÎãàÎã§.
    • Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î°§Î∑∞ÏôÄ Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∏ Î∑∞Î•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
    class BookDetailViewController: UIViewController {
    // MARK: - Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∏ Î∑∞
    var buttonView: UIView = {
        let view = UIView()
        view.backgroundColor = .yellow
        view.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return view
    }()

    // MARK: - Ï±Ö Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Í∞Ä Îã¥Í∏∏ Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î°§ Î∑∞
    var scrollView: UIScrollView = {
        let scrollView = UIScrollView()
        scrollView.backgroundColor = .cyan
        scrollView.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        scrollView.layer.borderWidth = 1
        scrollView.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return scrollView
    }()

    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
        view.backgroundColor = .white
        
        setupAddView()
        setupAutoLayout()
    }

    // MARK: - Î∑∞ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä 
    func setupAddView() {
        view.addSubview(scrollView)
        view.addSubview(buttonView)
    }

        // MARK: - Ïò§ÌÜ†Î†àÏù¥ÏïÑÏõÉ ÏÑ§Ï†ï
    func setupAutoLayout() {
        NSLayoutConstraint.activate([
            //Î≤ÑÌäº Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌõÑ Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î°§ Î∑∞
            scrollView.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.topAnchor),
            scrollView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor),
            scrollView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor),
            scrollView.bottomAnchor.constraint(equalTo: buttonView.topAnchor),

            //Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∞Îäî Î∑∞
            buttonView.heightAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.heightAnchor, multiplier: 0.1),
            buttonView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor),
            buttonView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor),
            buttonView.bottomAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.bottomAnchor),
        ])
    }
}

    Ïã§ÌñâÌôîÎ©¥

    2. Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ Î∑∞ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞

    • Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÎ•º Îã¥ÏùÑ Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÎ∑∞Î•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
    class BookDetailViewController: UIViewController {
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ
    var bookImageView: UIImageView = {
        let imageView = UIImageView()
        //imageView.contentMode = .scaleAspectFill
        imageView.contentMode = .scaleToFill
        imageView.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        imageView.layer.borderWidth = 1
        imageView.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return imageView
    }()

    // MARK: - Î∑∞ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä
    func setupAddView() {
        scrollView.addSubview(bookImageView)
    }
    
    // MARK: - Ïò§ÌÜ†Î†àÏù¥ÏïÑÏõÉ ÏÑ§Ï†ï
    func setupAutoLayout() {
        NSLayoutConstraint.activate([           
            //Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ
            bookImageView.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.topAnchor, constant: 50),
            bookImageView.centerXAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.centerXAnchor),
            bookImageView.heightAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.heightAnchor, multiplier: 0.4),
            bookImageView.widthAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.widthAnchor, multiplier: 0.5),
        ])
    }
}

    Ïã§ÌñâÌôîÎ©¥

    3. ÏòÅÌôîÏ†úÎ™©, Ï†ÄÏûê Îì± ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞

    • ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ ÌïÑÏöîÌïú ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
    class BookDetailViewController: UIViewController {
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Í∞Ä Îã¥Í∏∏ Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î°§ Î∑∞
    var scrollView: UIScrollView = {
        let scrollView = UIScrollView()
        scrollView.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        scrollView.layer.borderWidth = 1
        scrollView.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return scrollView
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ
    var bookImageView: UIImageView = {
        let imageView = UIImageView()
        //imageView.contentMode = .scaleAspectFill
        imageView.contentMode = .scaleToFill
        imageView.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        imageView.layer.borderWidth = 1
        imageView.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return imageView
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö Ï†úÎ™©
    var bookTitleLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Ï±Ö Ï†úÎ™©"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 25, weight: .bold)
        label.numberOfLines = 0
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï†ÄÏûêÏôÄ Î≤àÏó≠ Î†àÏù¥Î∏îÏùÑ Îã¥Îäî Ïä§ÌÉù Î∑∞
    var bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView: UIStackView = {
        let stackView = UIStackView()
        stackView.axis = .horizontal
        stackView.alignment = .fill
        stackView.distribution = .fillEqually
        stackView.spacing = 10
        stackView.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        stackView.layer.borderWidth = 1
        stackView.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return stackView
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï†ÄÏûê
    var bookAuthorsLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Ï†ÄÏûê"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 13, weight: .bold)
        label.textColor = .darkGray
        label.numberOfLines = 0
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Î≤àÏó≠
    var bookTranslatorsLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Î≤àÏó≠"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 13, weight: .bold)
        label.textColor = .darkGray
        label.numberOfLines = 0
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ìï†Ïù∏Ïú®, Ìï†Ïù∏ Í∞ÄÍ≤©, Ï†ïÍ∞ÄÎ•º Îã¥ÏùÑ Ïä§ÌÉù Î∑∞
    var bookPriceStackView: UIStackView = {
        let stackView = UIStackView()
        stackView.axis = .horizontal
        stackView.spacing = 5
        // Ïä§ÌÉùÎ∑∞Ïùò distribution ÏÜçÏÑ± ÏÑ§Ï†ï
        //stackView.distribution = .fill
        stackView.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        stackView.layer.borderWidth = 1
        stackView.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return stackView
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ìï†Ïù∏Ïú®
    var bookDiscountLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Ìï†Ïù∏Ïú®"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 18, weight: .bold)
        label.textColor = .red
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö ÏÑ∏Ïùº Í∞ÄÍ≤©
    var bookSalePriceLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "ÏÑ∏ÏùºÍ∞Ä"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 18, weight: .bold)
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö Í∞ÄÍ≤©
    var bookPriceLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Ï†ïÍ∞Ä"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 13, weight: .bold)
        label.textColor = .darkGray
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï∂úÌåêÏÇ¨
    var bookPublisherLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Ï∂úÌåêÏÇ¨"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 15, weight: .bold)
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú ÌÉÄÏù¥ÌãÄ
    var bookContentsTitleLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú"
        label.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 20, weight: .bold)
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú
    var bookContentsLabel: UILabel = {
        let label = UILabel()
        label.text = "Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú ÎÇ¥Ïö©"
        label.numberOfLines = 0
        label.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        label.layer.borderWidth = 1
        label.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return label
    }()

    // MARK: - Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∏ Î∑∞
    var buttonView: UIView = {
        let view = UIView()
        view.backgroundColor = .yellow
        view.layer.borderColor = #colorLiteral(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
        view.layer.borderWidth = 1
        view.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return view
    }()

    // MARK: - Î∑∞ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä
    func setupAddView() {
        //Ï†ÄÏûê Î∞è Î≤àÏó≠Í∞Ä
        bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView.addArrangedSubview(bookAuthorsLabel)
        bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView.addArrangedSubview(bookTranslatorsLabel)
        
        //Ìï†Ïù∏Ïú®, Ìï†Ïù∏Í∞Ä, Ï†ïÍ∞Ä
        bookPriceStackView.addArrangedSubview(bookDiscountLabel)
        bookPriceStackView.addArrangedSubview(bookSalePriceLabel)
        bookPriceStackView.addArrangedSubview(bookPriceLabel)
    
        scrollView.addSubview(bookImageView)                    //Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ
        scrollView.addSubview(bookTitleLabel)                   //Ï±Ö Ï†úÎ™©
        scrollView.addSubview(bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView)  //Ï†ÄÏûê Î∞è Î≤àÏó≠Í∞Ä
        scrollView.addSubview(bookPublisherLabel)               //Ï∂úÌåêÏÇ¨
        scrollView.addSubview(bookPriceStackView)               //Ìï†Ïù∏Ïú®, Ìï†Ïù∏Í∞Ä, Ï†ïÍ∞Ä
        scrollView.addSubview(bookContentsTitleLabel)           //Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú ÌÖçÏä§Ìä∏
        scrollView.addSubview(bookContentsLabel)                //Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú
        view.addSubview(scrollView)
        
        view.addSubview(buttonView)
    }

    // MARK: - Ïò§ÌÜ†Î†àÏù¥ÏïÑÏõÉ ÏÑ§Ï†ï
    func setupAutoLayout() {
        NSLayoutConstraint.activate([
            //Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î°§ Î∑∞
            scrollView.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.topAnchor),
            scrollView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor),
            scrollView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor),
            scrollView.bottomAnchor.constraint(equalTo: buttonView.topAnchor),
           
            //Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ
            bookImageView.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.topAnchor, constant: 50),
            bookImageView.centerXAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.centerXAnchor),
            bookImageView.heightAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.heightAnchor, multiplier: 0.4),
            bookImageView.widthAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.widthAnchor, multiplier: 0.5),
                        
            //Ï±Ö Ï†úÎ™©
            bookTitleLabel.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookImageView.bottomAnchor, constant: 30),
            bookTitleLabel.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.leadingAnchor, constant: 10),
            bookTitleLabel.widthAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.widthAnchor),
                        
            //Ï†ÄÏûê Î∞è Î≤àÏó≠Í∞Ä
            bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookTitleLabel.bottomAnchor, constant: 10),
            bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor, constant: 10),
            bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor, constant: -10),
            
            //Ï∂úÌåêÏÇ¨
            bookPublisherLabel.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookAuthorsTranslatorsStackView.bottomAnchor, constant: 10),
            bookPublisherLabel.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.leadingAnchor, constant: 10),
            
            //Ìï†Ïù∏Ïú®, Ìï†Ïù∏Í∞Ä, Ï†ïÍ∞Ä
            bookPriceStackView.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookPublisherLabel.bottomAnchor, constant: 30),
            bookPriceStackView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor, constant: 10),
            bookPriceStackView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor, constant: -10),            
            bookDiscountLabel.widthAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookPriceStackView.widthAnchor, multiplier: 0.15),
            bookSalePriceLabel.widthAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookPriceStackView.widthAnchor, multiplier: 0.25),
 
            //Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú ÌÉÄÏù¥ÌãÄ
            bookContentsTitleLabel.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookPriceStackView.bottomAnchor, constant: 30),
            bookContentsTitleLabel.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: scrollView.leadingAnchor, constant: 10),
            
            //Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú
            bookContentsLabel.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: bookContentsTitleLabel.bottomAnchor, constant: 10),
            bookContentsLabel.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor, constant: 10),
            bookContentsLabel.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor, constant: -10),
            bookContentsLabel.bottomAnchor.constraint(greaterThanOrEqualTo: scrollView.bottomAnchor),
            
            //Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∞Îäî Î∑∞
            buttonView.heightAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.heightAnchor, multiplier: 0.1),
            buttonView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor),
            buttonView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor),
            buttonView.bottomAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.bottomAnchor),      
        ])
    }

    Ïã§ÌñâÌôîÎ©¥

    4. Í≤ÄÏÉâÌôîÎ©¥ÏóêÏÑú Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Î∞õÏïÑÏò§Í∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Î≥ÄÏàò ÏÑ§Ï†ï

    • Í≤ÄÏÉâ ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóêÏÑú Î∞õÏùÄ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Ï†ÄÏû•Ìï† Î≥ÄÏàòÎ•º ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.
    class BookDetailViewController: UIViewController {
    var tempTitle: String?          //Ï±Ö Ï†úÎ™©
    var tempAuthors: [String]?      //Ï†ÄÏûê
    var tempTranslators: [String]?  //Î≤àÏó≠
    var tempPublisher: String?      //Ï∂úÌåêÏÇ¨
    var tempImageView: String?      //Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ
    var tempPrice: Int?             //Ï±Ö Í∞ÄÍ≤©
    var tempSalePrice: Int?         //Ï±Ö ÏÑ∏Ïùº Í∞ÄÍ≤©
    var tempContents: String?       //Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú
}

    5. ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÎ°ú Ïù¥Îèô Ïãú ÌÖåÏù¥Î∏î Î∑∞ Ï†ïÎ≥¥ ÎÑòÍ≤®Ï£ºÍ∏∞

    • ÏÖÄÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÍ≥† ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÎ°ú Ïù¥ÎèôÌï†Îïå ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄ Î≥ÄÏàòÏóê Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Ï†ÑÎã¨Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.
    extension SearchBookViewController: UITableViewDelegate {
    // MARK: - tableView CellÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌñàÏùÑÎïå ÌôîÎ©¥ Ïù¥Îèô
    func tableView(_ tableView: UITableView, didSelectRowAt indexPath: IndexPath) {
        let bookDetailVC = BookDetailViewController()
        bookDetailVC.tempTitle = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].title               //Ï±Ö Ï†úÎ™©
        bookDetailVC.tempAuthors = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].authors           //Ï†ÄÏûê
        bookDetailVC.tempTranslators = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].translators   //Î≤àÏó≠
        bookDetailVC.tempPublisher = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].publisher       //Ï∂úÌåêÏÇ¨ 
        bookDetailVC.tempImageView = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].thumbnail       //Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ
        bookDetailVC.tempSalePrice = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].salePrice       //Ï±Ö Ìï†Ïù∏Í∞Ä
        bookDetailVC.tempPrice = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].price               //Ï±Ö Í∞ÄÍ≤©
        bookDetailVC.tempContents = bookData?.documents[indexPath.row].contents         //Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú
        
        present(bookDetailVC, animated: true, completion: nil)
    }
}

    6. ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ÌôîÎ©¥ÏóêÏÑú ÏòµÏÖîÎÑê Ìï¥Ï†úÌïòÍ≥† Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Ìï†ÎãπÌïòÍ∏∞

    • ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏù∏ BookDetailViewControllerÏùò Î∑∞ÎîîÎìúÎ°úÎìúÏóê ÏòµÏÖîÎÑêÏùÑ Ìï¥Ï†úÌïòÍ≥† Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Ìï†ÎãπÌï©ÎãàÎã§.
    • Ïà´Ïûê ÏûêÎ¶¨Ïàò Î∞è Ï∑®ÏÜåÏÑ† Ï≤òÎ¶¨Î•º ÏúÑÌï¥ Ìï®ÏàòÎ•º Îî∞Î°ú ÎßåÎì§ÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
    • Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ Ï≤òÎ¶¨Î•º ÏúÑÌï¥ ÌÇπ ÌîºÏÖî ÎùºÏù¥Î∏åÎü¨Î¶¨Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
       override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
        view.backgroundColor = .white
        
        guard let title = tempTitle,
           let authors = tempAuthors,
           let translators = tempTranslators,
           let publisher = tempPublisher,
           let imageView = tempImageView,
           let salePrice = tempSalePrice,
           let price = tempPrice,
           let contents = tempContents else { return }
        
        bookTitleLabel.text = title
        bookAuthorsLabel.text = authors.joined(separator: ", ") + " Ï†ÄÏûê(Í∏Ä)"
 
        if translators.count == 0 {
            bookTranslatorsLabel.text = ""
        } else {
            bookTranslatorsLabel.text = translators.joined(separator: ", ") + " Î≤àÏó≠"
        }
        bookPublisherLabel.text = publisher     //Ï∂úÌåêÏÇ¨

        //Ï±Ö Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ         
        if let url = URL(string: imageView) {
            DispatchQueue.main.async { [weak self] in
                self?.bookImageView.kf.setImage(with: url)
            }
        }

        let discountPercent = ((Double(price) - Double(salePrice)) / Double(price)) * 100
        let formattedDiscount = String(format: "%.0f%%", discountPercent)
        bookDiscountLabel.text = "\(formattedDiscount)"                 //Ìï†Ïù∏Ïú®
        bookSalePriceLabel.text = setComma(number: salePrice) + "Ïõê"     //Ìï†Ïù∏Í∞Ä
        let salePriceWithUnderline = addStrikethrough(to: setComma(number: price) + "Ïõê")
        bookPriceLabel.attributedText = salePriceWithUnderline          //Ï†ïÍ∞Ä
        bookContentsLabel.text = contents   //Ï±Ö ÏÜåÍ∞ú
    }

    // MARK: - Í∞ÄÏö¥Îç∞ Î∞ëÏ§Ñ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä
    func addStrikethrough(to string: String) -> NSAttributedString {
        let attributedString = NSMutableAttributedString(string: string)
        attributedString.addAttribute(.strikethroughStyle, value: NSUnderlineStyle.single.rawValue, range: NSRange(location: 0, length: string.count))
        return attributedString
    }
    
    // MARK: - Ïà´Ïûê ÏûêÎ¶¨Ïàò Ï∂îÍ∞Ä
    func setComma(number: Int) -> String {
        let numberFormatter: NumberFormatter = NumberFormatter()
        numberFormatter.numberStyle = .decimal
        if let num = numberFormatter.string(for: number) {
            return num
        } else {
            return String(number)
        }
    }

    Ïã§ÌñâÌôîÎ©¥

    7. Îã´Í∏∞ Î≤ÑÌäº Î∞è Îì±Î°ù Î≤ÑÌäº Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞

    • Î≤ÑÌäº Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÎ•º ÏúÑÌï¥ ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ ÎÜìÏùÄ Î∑∞Ïóê Ïä§ÌÉùÎ∑∞Î•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ≥† Ïä§ÌÉùÎ∑∞Ïóê Îã´Í∏∞ Î≤ÑÌäºÍ≥º Îì±Î°ù Î≤ÑÌäºÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
    • Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÎ∑∞Î•º Ï†úÏô∏Ìïú ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ Í∞ùÏ≤¥Îì§Ïùò ÌÖåÎëêÎ¶¨Î•º ÏóÜÏï¥ÏäµÎãàÎã§.
        // MARK: - Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∏ Î∑∞
    var buttonView: UIView = {
        let view = UIView()
        view.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return view
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Îã´Í∏∞ Î≤ÑÌäº
    var closeButton: UIButton = {
        let button = UIButton()
        button.setImage(UIImage(systemName: "xmark"), for: .normal)
        button.tintColor = .white   //Î≤ÑÌäºÏùò ÏÉâÏÉÅ
        button.backgroundColor = .darkGray
        button.clipsToBounds = true
        button.layer.cornerRadius = 10
        button.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return button
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Îã¥Í∏∞ Î≤ÑÌäº
    var addButton: UIButton = {
        let button = UIButton()
        button.setTitle("Ï±Ö Îã¥Í∏∞", for: .normal)
        button.titleLabel?.font = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 20, weight: .bold)
        button.setTitleColor(.white, for: .normal)
        button.backgroundColor = .orange
        button.clipsToBounds = true
        button.layer.cornerRadius = 10
        button.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return button
    }()
    
    // MARK: - Îã´Í∏∞ Î∞è Îã¥Í∏∞ Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∞Îäî Ïä§ÌÉù Î∑∞
    var buttonStackView: UIStackView = {
        let stackView = UIStackView()
        stackView.axis = .horizontal
        stackView.spacing = 10
        stackView.translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints = false
        return stackView
    }()

    buttonStackView.addArrangedSubview(closeButton)
    buttonStackView.addArrangedSubview(addButton)
    buttonView.addSubview(buttonStackView)
    view.addSubview(buttonView)

    //Î≤ÑÌäºÏù¥ Îã¥Í∏∞Îäî Î∑∞
    buttonView.heightAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.heightAnchor, multiplier: 0.1),
    buttonView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.leadingAnchor),
    buttonView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.trailingAnchor),
    buttonView.bottomAnchor.constraint(equalTo: view.safeAreaLayoutGuide.bottomAnchor),
    
    //Îã´Í∏∞Î≤ÑÌäºÍ≥º Îã¥Í∏∞ Î≤ÑÌäºÏùÑ Ïä§ÌÉùÎ∑∞Î°ú Î¨∂Í∏∞
    buttonStackView.topAnchor.constraint(equalTo: buttonView.topAnchor, constant: 10),
    buttonStackView.leadingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: buttonView.leadingAnchor, constant: 10),
    buttonStackView.trailingAnchor.constraint(equalTo: buttonView.trailingAnchor, constant: -10),
    buttonStackView.bottomAnchor.constraint(equalTo: buttonView.bottomAnchor, constant: -10),
    
    //leading, trailing, spacingÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê -30, Î≤ÑÌäºÏùÑ 1:4 ÎπÑÏú®Î°ú
    closeButton.widthAnchor.constraint(equalToConstant: (view.bounds.width - 30) * 0.2),
    addButton.widthAnchor.constraint(equalToConstant: (view.bounds.width - 30) * 0.8),

    Ïã§ÌñâÌôîÎ©¥

    ÎßàÎ¨¥Î¶¨

    • Ï±Ö ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏùò UIÎ•º Íµ¨ÏÑ±ÌïòÍ≥† Í≤ÄÏÉâÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóêÏÑú ÎÑòÍ≤® Î∞õÏùÄ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï£ºÎèÑÎ°ù ÎßåÎì§ÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
    • Ïò§ÌÜ†Î†àÏù¥ÏïÑÏõÉÌïòÍ≥† UIÍµ¨ÏÑ±ÌïòÎäîÎç∞ ÎÑàÎ¨¥ ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏùÑ ÎßéÏù¥ Î∫êÍ≤ºÏäµÎãàÎã§‚Ä¶ üò≠

    ÌÉúÍ∑∏: Code Base, iOS, TabBarController, UICollectionView, UICollectionViewCell, UICollectionViewFlowLayout, UIKit, UINavigationController, UISearchController, UITabBarController, UITableView, UITableViewCell

    7 Î∂Ñ ÏÜåÏöî

    iOS Ïï± Í∞úÎ∞ú Ïã¨Ìôî Í∞úÏù∏ Í≥ºÏ†ú - Ï±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 5

    [ÎÇ¥Î∞∞Ï∫†] iOS Ïï± Í∞úÎ∞ú Ïã¨Ìôî Í∞úÏù∏ Í≥ºÏ†ú - Ï±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 3

    4 Î∂Ñ ÏÜåÏöî

    iOS Ïï± Í∞úÎ∞ú Ïã¨Ìôî Í∞úÏù∏ Í≥ºÏ†ú - Ï±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 3

    [ÎÇ¥Î∞∞Ï∫†] iOS Ïï± Í∞úÎ∞ú Ïã¨Ìôî Í∞úÏù∏ Í≥ºÏ†ú - Ï±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 2

    iOS Ïï± Í∞úÎ∞ú Ïã¨Ìôî Í∞úÏù∏ Í≥ºÏ†ú - Ï±Ö Í≤ÄÏÉâ Ïï± ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ 2
